Name: Pinecone
Ingredients: 45 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: MUDDLE cloves in base of shaker to crush. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Honey and pineapple, laced with aromatic pisco and spiced with clove.
History: Created by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
